Ali Knight, GreenLight Fund, New York University, About, An experienced, equity-focused leader with a proven track record of scaling organizations.
The GreenLight Fund, a national nonprofit funder with 13 sites across the country, today announced the appointment of Ali Knight as Chief Executive Officer.
